duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely transport product to customers in a timely and efficient manner to meet customer and company expectations.
Effectively build partnerships with the individual(s) who oversee the frozen pizza category sales at store level.
Use an entrepreneurial approach to grow existing business, including building relationships and rapport with customers.
Unload, stock, rotate, and pull product, ensuring shelves are full on every visit.
Maintain an efficient routing schedule with flexibility based upon customer needs.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver’s license (CDL class B preferred) and acceptable driving record
